dict.acceptation: 掷（色子）；抛；猛动（头、臂、腿）；使处于，使限于；

sent.orig: You can throw balls with an overhead throw.
sent.trans: 你可以采用过顶扣球的方式投球。

sent.orig: The most common injuries in javelin throw training were elbow joint throw.
sent.trans: 标枪训练中最常见的创伤主要是肘关节损伤。

sent.orig: It's your throw, eg your turn to throw the dice.
sent.trans: 该你掷了（如该你掷色子）。

sent.orig: How can you throw a ball and have it return to throw it back to you?
sent.trans: 把球扔出去，不能碰任何物体，不能让别人扔回来，怎样使球乖乖地回到你手里？

sent.orig: The best throw of the dice is to throw them away.
sent.trans: 最佳的掷鹘子法，就是把它们扔掉。
